page.title: 06School Life.
page.content: A Day in the Life of Lisa Nuttall (12 years) Tuesday morning.Sun streaming through my blinds.7.30.a.m.I got up, washed, dressed, cleaned my teeth, combed my hair.Mum was already dressed.I got my dinner money and went to get the bus.I talked to my friends on the bus and when we got off we went to the town centre to buy sweets.To school. We sat in the cloakroom chatting about T.V.When the bell went we went to registration.On to Music for an exam.I was frightened because I didn't really understand it. BREAK!Then Science.We carried on with our Project.DINNERTIME!Then Humanities followed by Art.HOMETIME! After tea I played out until 8p.m.Then T.V. until bed at 10p.m.
